name: Mysterious Mood
description: Enigmatic and intriguing atmosphere with obscured composition and secretive undertones

prompt.base: Mysterious enigmatic atmosphere, intriguing mood, obscured composition, secretive tone, cryptic environment, hidden undertones, veiled quality, shadowy mystery, puzzling atmosphere
prompt.positive: mysterious atmosphere, enigmatic mood, intriguing setting, obscured composition, secretive tone, cryptic environment, hidden elements, veiled quality, shadowy mystery, puzzling atmosphere, unknown depths, concealed secrets
prompt.negative: obvious atmosphere, transparent mood, clear setting, straightforward tone, revealed environment, explicit mood, no mystery

technical.lighting: Selective lighting with areas of darkness

variations.name: Supernatural Mysterious
variations.modifier: otherworldly elements, paranormal atmosphere, ghostly presence, ethereal mystery, unexplained phenomena

variations.name: Detective Mysterious
variations.modifier: clues and evidence, investigative atmosphere, puzzle elements, noir mystery, crime scene intrigue

variations.name: Romantic Mysterious
variations.modifier: alluring stranger, seductive mystery, hidden identity, enigmatic charm, intriguing attraction

examples: A foggy alleyway with mysterious atmosphere, obscured details, enigmatic and intriguing mood
A masked figure in shadows, mysterious lighting, secretive and cryptic atmosphere
